AUDX.ChangeLog: V 0.2.3.0& - Major : 0& - Minor : 2& - Minor Revision : 3& - Build : 0&Loop and Shuffle buttons are now with media controls&Added a playlist maker&Stream Downloader now support forwarding to Internet Download Manager (IDM)&Fixed multiple instances&Quick Access items can now be changed&Added enhanced keyboard controls (CTRL+K)&Home background can now be changed&Remade notifications system&Fixed some bugs related to the downloads manager&Next/Previous songs now shows on every tab&New visualisation engine&Fixed Youtube video thumbnail&Files now can be preview on the go using the preview player&Console apps now open in new window
